page.title: 15MY FAVOURITE T.V. PROGRAMME
page.content: On television my favourite programme is Cover_Up.I sometimes like other programes.Sometimes I go out_side and miss Cover_Up and forget that it is on.When I sit down I ask if I could turn the over.Dad sometimes watches the news so that I cannot watch it.In Cover_Up they have nice people.There were these girls doing modelling.The baddies are always in it.I see that Max the boy model always catches them. I stare at the television when I am intrested in the programe.I always make sure that I am comfortable before I watch the programme.Sometimes mum and dad talk while I am watching my programe.Mark,Mum and dad say they dont like the silly programe.The television sometimes goes wrong so we just sit there until it comes right.
